page.title: 04A SCHOOLGIRL'S DAY
page.content: A Typical Day I get up at 7-30am. I have a bath or a shower, brush my teeth and put on my school uniform. I go downstairs and have breakfast. Afterwards I brush my hair and tie it back with an elastic band and I collect my school bag. At 8-30am a school taxi collects me as I live more than 3 miles from school. School begins at 9-00am. At 12 noon we have lunch. Some people have a cooked school lunch, others have a packed lunch from home and a few who live nearby go home to eat. School ends at 3-15pm and I return home on the taxi arriving about 3-30pm. I take our three dogs out for a walk. At 4pm I practise on the piano. Later I have my supper and watch the television. I go to bed at 9pm and read for a short time before going to sleep.
